label: 工藤平助
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: A medical practitioner from Sendai [who wrote] Aka Ezo fūsetsukō.  Kudō's argument in favor of commercial exchange with Russia was so convincing that the senior councilor dispatched a team to Hokkaido in 1785 to investigate the possibilities of opening trade relations (p. 465). [仙台、赤蝦夷風説考、北海道]
